article.Heading: 10 lakh tax payers file GSTR-3B till 10 am today: Sources
article.Summary: The government had extended the goods and services tax (GST) filing period from August 20 to August 25 and CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that 10 lakh tax payers have filed till this morning.
article.Body:
The government had extended the goods and services tax (GST) filing period from August 20 to August 25 and CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that 10 lakh tax payers have filed till this morning.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Timsy Jaipuria for exclusive details.
